# Byte‑compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# C extensions
*.so

# Distribution / packaging
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/
.eggs/
*.egg

# PyInstaller
*.manifest
*.spec

# Unit test / coverage reports
coverage.xml
*.cover
*.py,cover
htmlcov/
*.pytest_cache/
nosetests.xml

# Virtual environments
venv/
.env/
.venv/

# Jupyter Notebook checkpoints
.ipynb_checkpoints/

# IDE / Editor folders and files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-workspace
*.sublime-project

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Your output / media you don’t want to commit (for your project)
*.mp4
*.gif
